events.text: why the hell does any of this work
i gave up adding comments at some point so have fun
might do a technical update at some point that'll add comments

children.text: every ball type is sorted and has its own events for easy debug

actions.text: give the balls special numbers to differentiate from balls that aren't colliding
this function will run the deletion of the balls and spawning of a greater one

children.text: find the first ball, log its coordinates, and delete it
find the second ball, log its coordinates, and delete it
find the point between the two balls and create a new ball there
for debug purposes a sprite with an image point directly in the middle is used to visibly see spawn checks
